title: Teen girl identified as East Cleveland fatal shooting victim
content:
EAST CLEVELAND, Ohio -- A 17-year-old girl was identified as the victim of a fatal shooting early Saturday in a section of East Cleveland that consists of mostly abandoned buildings.
The Cuyahoga County Medical Examiner identified the girl as Breanna Fluitt of Cleveland.
East Cleveland police said residents reported hearing gunfire on First Avenue, between Hayden Avenue and East 133rd Street.
They found the girl dead of gunshot wounds there and requested an ambulance.
The woman was later pronounced dead, police said.
Investigators spent the night investigating the shooting and trying to identify Fluitt, who had no identification with her when she was found, police said.
